original_text: But all the people that the fire, the smoke and the sulphur did not kill continued to do bad things. They did not change how they lived. They worshipped things that they had made for themselves. They worshipped demons and idols that they made from gold, silver, bronze, stone and wood. Those idols cannot see anything or hear anything. They cannot walk anywhere. But the people continued to worship them.
korean_text: 이 재앙에 죽지 않고 남은 사람들은 손으로 행한 일을 회개하지 아니하고 오히려 여러 귀신과 또는 보거나 듣거나 다니거나 하지 못하는 금, 은, 동과 목석의 우상에게 절하고

sentences.original_text: But all the people that the fire, the smoke and the sulphur did not kill
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 불, 연기, 유황에 죽지 않은 모든 사람들은

sentences.original_text: They did not change how they lived
They worshipped things that they had made for themselves
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 자신들을 위해 만든 것들을 숭배했습니다

sentences.original_text: that they made from gold, silver, bronze, stone and wood
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 금, 은, 청동, 돌, 나무로 만든 것들을

sentences.original_text: Those idols cannot see anything or hear anything
sentences.korean_translation: 그 우상들은 아무것도 보지 못하고 들을 수도 없습니다

sentences.original_text: But the people continued to worship them
